answers.answer: Awe I'm 4 weeks one day I've been getting stomach cramps they say its normal back I'm not sure how did you get. Into a doctor so soon they won't even give me my medicaid till may 1st blah
its totally normal! Im 12w4d and I still have cramping. I just take some tylenol (dr said.tylenol is safe) and use.a heating pad and that usually works for me. good luck and.congrats on the baby!

I had cramping until I was about 10-12 weeks and then it went away. I was worried but its your uterus growing and your body getting ready for a baby and the implantation. I am going to be 20weeks tomorrow and everything is going well. Just make sure you ladies aren't having lots of blood along with your cramps and if your concerned see a dr they are able to answer questions :) good luck mommies
Sooo normal! Im only 6 weeks and found out at 4 weeks and the cramping i had at first scared me!

The doc didn't want to see me till the 23rd till I let them know I had a history of preeclampsia and then they made me an appointment for the following day(today). Thank you for the responses ladies. It doesn't feel severe at all, just very dull and I've had no bleeding since I saw implantation bleeding (just a few pinkish spots) and got a positive hpt a few days later. Thank you all again :)

question: I'm 4 weeks and 4 days and I have been having occasional dull cramping low and toward my back. Is this normal? I have an appointment this afternoon.
title: 4 weeks and cramping
